answers.answer: That could be a symptom of anything. I think people would need a bit more to go on.
like you feel hot? that could be hot flashes.

Since you gave us a really short description and no specific localisation of your symptoms i would recomend checking out this website if you can rule out any disease or find the one you might have if you have any at all and yes anxiety can cause burning sensation all over the body.Best regards,M4

Check out MH's Symptom Checker and write us back with more details on what you are feeling. While burning CAN be a symptom of anxiety, you did not list any of the true "classic" symptoms for anxiety/panic.You may also want to check out the Diabetes Forum and ask the good folks over there about this burning you feel. It may have more to do with the diabetes/insulin than anxiety.PeaceGreenlydia

i forgot to include the link for the website i wanted you to check out about your symptoms so i did wrote another post with the website inclued but i got removed so i hope you had time to check it out before it got removed

question: Hello I am 28 years old very stressful person always have beenI get burning sensations all over at timesI am insulin diabetic alsoPlease let me know thank you
title: Do you think I have Anxiety?
